title: Communism - History of an Illusion
description:
Warning: No English subtitles available during conversation in German and Russian! Hard subbed in Portuguese. Sorry folks!

The rise and fall of communism, from Lenin to Gorbachev. Includes an interview with Sergei Kruschev, son of Nikita Khrushchev, and with former members of KGB as Vladimir Kryuchkov.
